[{"id":"OD-85","entityId":"2-475","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"OD"},{"name":"summary","value":"Fix missing number in firebase"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Rick Dupont"},{"name":"created","value":"1595347327816"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"85"},{"name":"description","value":"

Firebase project function buildFromAssignment looks at the xact_assignment "home_phone" field for filling out the insuredPhoneNumber data. However, not all numbers will always be filled out.

As per discussion with Justin Cook, send the Mobile number if available, if not then send Home, and finally if neither of those are filled out send Business.

we need to create an invoice for each one of these assignments to be pushed up as a PDF document to XA after the inspection is completed. We just need to put the address, claim number, our billing address and $300 per file for these.

Needs to match the Billing Sheet attached below.

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Garth Murray"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"garthpmurray"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"garthpmurray"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1595012835044"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"OD-83","type":"Subtask","role":"parent for"}]},{"name":"State","value":["In Progress"],"valueId":["In Progress"],"color":null},{"name":"Sprints","value":["On-Demand Project"],"valueId":["On-Demand Project"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"ch","fullName":"Chris Heywood"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"4-105","author":"garthpmurray","authorFullName":"Garth Murray","issueId":"OD-79","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Here's how to call the new API:

Same end points you're using for the attachments and notes, i.e.:
https://api.grsclaims.com/ondemandTEST/ for test and https://api.grsclaims.com/ondemand/ for live, using the same API key you're using already.

POST to /ondemand[TEST]/assignments/{transactionID}/reassign

The body of the POST is this form of JSON:
{
"XNAddress": "GLOBAL.SARASOTA.FL.TEST",
"XM8UserId": "CH"
}

As with the Notes endpoint the call is going to be processed and forwarded over to Xact immediately and will straightaway either return 200 Success or 400 error. When there's an error there'll be a JSON body like this: {"error": "no XNAddress"}.

You'll note there's an XM8UserId attribute in the JSON. That's actually optional, i.e. you can just send the XNAddress and leave out the XM8UserId attribute altogether. BUT, I've discussed this with Elizabeth at Xact and she says "You don’t necessarily have to send over the XM8 userid, but it will default to the main user on the account, and instead of going directly to the assigned user the assignment will show up under ‘all projects’, if that makes sense." Which doesn't actually make a whole lot of sense to me! But I think we just need to try it in the live environment and see how it comes through in Xact when you just send, say, an XNAddress of GLOBAL.EV.JUSTIN.SARASOTA.FL.2 without a XM8UserId.
